translation.en: When I was born, the world was a far simpler place.
translation.ja: オレが生まれた時 世界はもっと単純だった

translation.en: It was all just cops and robbers.
translation.ja: 世の中には⸺ 警官と泥棒だけ

translation.en: Fucking get down! Get down now!
translation.ja: 全員 腹ばいになれ！

translation.en: But it wasn't for me.
translation.ja: オレには向いてなかった

translation.en: Then came the Summer of Love.
translation.ja: やがて“1967年(サマー･オブ･ラブ)”

translation.en: Hashish and LSD arrived on the scene.
translation.ja: ハシシやＬＳＤが登場した

translation.en: There were villains locked away for 12 years... ...for robbing a bank of 10 grand...
translation.ja: 銀行強盗は１万ポンド奪って 懲役12年となり⸺

translation.en: ...doing time with drippy hippies doing 12 months...
translation.ja: ヒッピーたちは 懲役12か月

translation.en: ...for smuggling 2 million quid's worth of puff.
translation.ja: 200万ポンドの 大麻密輸の罪でだ

translation.en: I mean, work it out, mate. We're in the wrong fucking game.
translation.ja: 気づいたほうがいい 稼業を変えたほうが…

translation.en: Drugs changed everything.
translation.ja: 麻薬が何もかも 変えてしまったんだ

translation.en: Always remember that one day this drug monkey-business will be legal.
translation.ja: いつかドラッグ･ビジネスは 合法となる

translation.en: They won't leave it to people like me when they figure out...
translation.ja: どれだけ儲かるか分かれば 誰もが手を出す

translation.en: ...how much money there is to be made: not millions, fucking billions.
translation.ja: どれだけ儲かるか分かれば 誰もが手を出す 数百万ではなく 数十億の市場だ

translation.en: Recreational Drugs plc. Giving people what they want.
translation.ja: “麻薬株式会社”が 大衆に娯楽を供給する

translation.en: Good times today, stupor tomorrow.
translation.ja: 今日は快楽 明日は無気力

translation.en: But this is now.
translation.ja: だが これは今の話

translation.en: So, until prohibition ends, make hay while the sun shines.
translation.ja: 合法化されるまでは 甘い汁を吸わねば

translation.en: I'm not a gangster.
translation.ja: オレはギャングじゃない

translation.en: I'm a businessman whose commodity happens to be cocaine.
translation.ja: たまたまコカインを扱う ビジネスマン

translation.en: Ten years ago, charlie was for pop stars or a celebrity's birthday bash.
translation.ja: 10年前 コカインは有名人の 誕生パーティ用だった

translation.en: It was demonized by Daily Mail readers getting drunk in wine bars.
translation.ja: かつて麻薬を蔑(さげす)んだ 一般人たちが⸺

translation.en: Now they're my biggest clients.
translation.ja: 今はオレの最大の顧客

translation.en: This is Clarkie. Double first at Cambridge in Industrial Chemistry.
translation.ja: 彼はクラーキー ケンブリッジを優等で卒業

translation.en: Well, he's gotta pay off his student loan somehow.
translation.ja: 学費のローンが残っている

translation.en: Today, I only deal in kilos. Depending which tariff you use...
translation.ja: オレはコカインを キロ単位で取引してる

translation.en: ...that'll cost you either 28 grand or 15 years in prison...
translation.ja: 市場価格は２万8000 捕まれば懲役15年

translation.en: ...which is more time than a rapist.
translation.ja: レイプ犯より重い罪だ

translation.en: C'est la vie.
translation.ja: それも人生

translation.en: It is vital that we work to a few golden rules.
translation.ja: オレたちは 厳格なルールに従っている

translation.en: Always work in a small team.
translation.ja: “常に少人数で動き 決して目立つな”

translation.en: Keep a very low profile. Only deal with people who come recommended.
translation.ja: “常に少人数で動き 決して目立つな” “取引は紹介された 人物だけ”

translation.en: It's like selling anything:
translation.ja: 他の業界と同じだ

translation.en: washing machines, handmade shoes, blowjobs.
translation.ja: 電気店や靴店や娼婦と

translation.en: As long as you don't take the piss, people will come back for more.
translation.ja: 正直に商売すれば客はつく

translation.en: That's not to say we don't weave that magic that makes two kilos three...
translation.ja: ２キロに混ぜ物をして ３キロにすることも…

translation.en: ...but never be too greedy.
translation.ja: 欲ばりすぎては いけない

translation.en: Know and respect your enemy.
translation.ja: 敵を知り 尊重する

translation.en: It is only very, very stupid people who think the law is stupid.
translation.ja: 法律をバカにする奴は 本物のバカだけだ

translation.en: And avoid like the fucking plague...
translation.ja: アムステルダム 何より 避けるべきは⸺ 何より 避けるべきは⸺

translation.en: ...loud, attention-seeking wannabe gangsters...
translation.ja: 目立ちたがりのえせギャング

translation.en: ...in it for the glory, to be a face, to be a name.
translation.ja: 名を上げたいだけの連中だ

translation.en: Hello, Slavo. Yeah, it's the Duke.
translation.ja: スラヴォか？ デュークだ

translation.en: Everything's sweet. When can we meet?
translation.ja: 全て順調だ　いつ会う？

translation.en: They don't mean to fuck up. They just do.
translation.ja: 連中は意図せずとも⸺ ヘマをする

translation.en: Forgive me for stating the obvious, but stay away from the end-user.
translation.ja: 当然のことだが 末端のユーザーは避ける

translation.en: They are guaranteed to bring you trouble.
translation.ja: 必ず問題が起きる

translation.en: As do guns.
translation.ja: 銃もダメだ

translation.en: I hate guns. And violence.
translation.ja: 銃と暴力は嫌いだが⸺

translation.en: But as some Roman general once said:
translation.ja: 古代ローマの将軍は言った

translation.en: "If you seek peace, plan for war."
translation.ja: “平和のためには 戦争の準備を”

translation.en: Morty and his assistant Terry, they watch my back.
translation.ja: モーティとテリーは オレの用心棒

translation.en: Morty learnt caution the hard way. He did 10 years inside.
translation.ja: モーティは ム所暮らし10年の苦労人

translation.en: He's my bridge to the criminal world...
translation.ja: 犯罪界への仲介役

translation.en: ...and he ensures that the traffic is one-way.
translation.ja: オレの正体を隠してくれる

translation.en: Look, there's Amsterdam, and there's Oofdorfe...dorfe.
translation.ja: ここがアムステルダムで…

translation.en: Not a fucking clue. None of them speak English.
translation.ja: 誰も英語 話さねえ 車に乗るんだ この方向に違いない

translation.en: -Get in the car. I'm sure it's that way. -Move up.
translation.ja: 車に乗るんだ この方向に違いない

translation.en: -I bet you it's that way. -We've already been that way.
translation.ja: こっちだ そっちは行った

translation.en: Yeah, but we're gonna go that way again. Give us the map.
translation.ja: もう１度だ 地図よこせ

translation.en: Oh, don't start, the pair of you.
translation.ja: またケンカか いい加減にしろ

translation.en: It's like being out with a pair of kids.
translation.ja: このガキども １日中 文句たれやがって

translation.en: -All day you've been moaning. -It can't be that difficult.
translation.ja: １日中 文句たれやがって すぐ見つかるさ 温室なんて多くねえから

translation.en: How many fucking greenhouses can there be?
translation.ja: すぐ見つかるさ 温室なんて多くねえから

translation.en: Morty.
translation.ja: モーティ

translation.en: Terence.
translation.ja: テリー

translation.en: Clarkie.
translation.ja: クラーキー

translation.en: Very, very important: pay your supplier prompt.
translation.ja: 非常に大切なのは 供給者に金をちゃんと払う事

translation.en: In our case, that's Mr. Jimmy Price. He's the top of the pyramid.
translation.ja: ジミー･プライスという男が オレたちのボス

translation.en: Pay him. In full, on time, without fail, no short counts.
translation.ja: 彼に全額を期限通り きちんと払う

translation.en: You get no second chances. Jimmy calls the shots.
translation.ja: さもないとジミーは 容赦ない仕打ちをする

translation.en: Where the fuck is Gene?
translation.ja: ジーンは どこだ？

translation.en: -I don't know. Ask me one on sport. -What time does your watch tell?
translation.ja: 知らねえ　他の質問を 何時だ？

translation.en: -The same as yours. -He's never late.
translation.ja: 時計 見ろ 遅いな

translation.en: Shut the fuck up.
translation.ja: ２人とも黙れ

translation.en: Patience.
translation.ja: 気長に

translation.en: Gene here is Jimmy's right-hand man.
translation.ja: ジーンはジミーの右腕

translation.en: Been with him since way back.
translation.ja: かなりの古株で⸺

translation.en: All the drugs and cash go through Gene.
translation.ja: 金とヤクを全て扱う

translation.en: Jimmy trusts him with his life.
translation.ja: 全幅の信頼を得てる

translation.en: By the way, Jimmy would like to see you tomorrow for a spot of lunch.
translation.ja: ところで⸺ ジミーが明日 ランチをと

translation.en: Wait a minute. Is there a problem?
translation.ja: 待てよ 問題でも？

translation.en: Why does everybody assume there's a problem because he wants a word?
translation.ja: ジミーが話したいだけで なぜ問題と？

translation.en: Maybe he's grateful. He fucking should be.
translation.ja: 感謝かも きっとそうだ

translation.en: See you at Stoke Park at 1.
translation.ja: ストーク･パークに１時

translation.en: This is just so beautiful.
translation.ja: すごくキレイ

translation.en: We need to get in and out of here sharpish. Paul and the tide ain't gonna wait.
translation.ja: 慎重に急いでやらなきゃ 船が出ちまう

translation.en: Everyone likes to walk through a door marked "Private."
translation.ja: “会員専用”のドアに 入るには⸺

translation.en: Therefore, have a good reason to be affluent.
translation.ja: 金銭的に裕福でなければ ダメだ

translation.en: I own a share in a very successful letting agency.
translation.ja: オレは不動産賃貸業でも⸺

translation.en: It gives me an honest income. Looks good on the self-assessment.
translation.ja: 合法的に稼いでる 税務署も疑わない

translation.en: Whereas years ago scallywags were trying to get money out of banks...
translation.ja: ひと昔前には⸺ 犯罪者は 預金引き出しに 苦労したが⸺

translation.en: ...now your problem is how to get your ill-gotten gains in.
translation.ja: 今は銀行への入金に苦労する

translation.en: That's a job for Mr. Singh. He does my laundry.
translation.ja: それはシンの仕事 彼は一週間で オレの金を浄化し⸺

translation.en: And in a week, it will be ready for collection...
translation.ja: 彼は一週間で オレの金を浄化し⸺

translation.en: ...in the form of a nice clean check for a round million.
translation.ja: きれいに100万ポンドの 小切手として用意してくれる

translation.en: The business is on the up and up.
translation.ja: 商売は上り調子

translation.en: But I've always said, have a plan and stick to it.
translation.ja: だがオレの主義は “計画に従い⸺”

translation.en: Quit while you're ahead.
translation.ja: “好調なうちに引退する”

translation.en: So barring any fuck-ups, I'm leaving it all behind.
translation.ja: 失敗がなければ じき足を洗う

translation.en: No, we got the parcel.
translation.ja: ブツは手に入った

translation.en: Yeah, better than expected, actually.
translation.ja: 上質のブツだったが⸺

translation.en: It's just that things have gone a little bit slightly turbo this end.
translation.ja: 取引現場で 少々混乱があった

translation.en: Come on, boys, lively, lively.
translation.ja: ほら キビキビやれ

translation.en: If we miss this tide, we're not going anywhere till daylight.
translation.ja: この潮を逃すと 朝まで運べない

translation.en: Paul, you ain't being paid to moan.
translation.ja: 文句言うのが仕事か？

translation.en: You're being paid to get my cargo home.
translation.ja: 黙って船を出せ

translation.en: Come on, babe. You all right? Careful here, it's a bit wobbly.
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？ 気をつけろ　揺れるぞ

translation.en: Life is so fucking good, I can taste it in my spit.
translation.ja: 人生の甘い味を オレは舌の上に感じる

translation.en: I'll treat tomorrow's lunch like the Last Supper, feign interest in his tales.
translation.ja: 明日は“最後の晩餐”だ ボスの昔話に 軽く付き合い⸺

translation.en: And then leave quietly forever.
translation.ja: 静かに 永遠に立ち去る

translation.en: This is pure class.
translation.ja: 豪勢な建物だ

translation.en: Please, follow me, gentlemen.
translation.ja: こちらへどうぞ

translation.en: Mr. Price is in the Oval Room.
translation.ja: プライス氏は 〝大統領室 〞に

translation.en: -Your guests, Mr. Price. -Thanks, Angelo. Welcome. Sit down.
translation.ja: お客様です ご苦労 よく来た　座れ

translation.en: How is it with that Paki accountant I put your way?
translation.ja: 紹介したパキスタン人の 会計士はどうしてる？

translation.en: -He still doing the business? -Raj is doing a very good job.
translation.ja: 紹介したパキスタン人の 会計士はどうしてる？ お世話になってます

translation.en: Good. Paying your bit of straight-goer's tax, eh?
translation.ja: 表の仕事の 税金は払ってるか？

translation.en: We all have to do our bit.
translation.ja: 義務ですからね

translation.en: Say hello from me next time you see him.
translation.ja: 私から〝よろしく 〞と

translation.en: You hungry? The grub here will make your bollocks tingle.
translation.ja: 腹 減ってるか？ ここの飯は うまくて タマが震えるぞ

translation.en: Let's eat.
translation.ja: ここの飯は うまくて タマが震えるぞ

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: We've gotta test the "snap, crackle and pop" factor on these.
translation.ja: さあ この商品の 品質を試すんだ

translation.en: Don't ask me. I ain't fucking touching them.
translation.ja: オレは嫌だね 触りたくねえよ

translation.en: You are a miserable bastard, you really are.
translation.ja: 情けねえ野郎だな

translation.en: -Brian. -What?
translation.ja: ブライアン

translation.en: Sit down, mate. Got a little treat for you.
translation.ja: 座れよ “ごちそう”をやる

translation.en: Help yourself.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: A little privacy, please, Angelo.
translation.ja: 外してくれ アンジェロ

translation.en: What do you want, son?
translation.ja: 何が望みだ？

translation.en: -Excuse me? -In life. What are you after?
translation.ja: 何って？ 人生に求めるものは？

translation.en: A shot at the title? A seat by the band?
translation.ja: 頂上を目指すか？ 特等席の観客か？

translation.en: Well, I don't know, Mr. Price. That's a very expansive question.
translation.ja: 分かりません 質問の範囲がユルいので

translation.en: Right, expansive. Good answer.
translation.ja: “ユルい”か　いい答えだ

translation.en: Years ago, people would've thought you were a homosexual...
translation.ja: 昔 その言葉を使うのは ゲイだった

translation.en: ...using a word like "expansive."
translation.ja: お前は同性愛者じゃないな どうだ？

translation.en: -You're not a homosexual, are you? -No.
translation.ja: お前は同性愛者じゃないな どうだ？ 違う

translation.en: -Not behind with the rent? -No.
translation.ja: 掘られてないな？ ええ

translation.en: No, I didn't think you were.
translation.ja: そうだと思った

translation.en: No harm in it, I suppose. Times change.
translation.ja: ゲイでもいい 時代は変わった

translation.en: You know why people like you can't leave this business?
translation.ja: お前のような奴は 足を洗えない

translation.en: Because you make too much money for people like me.
translation.ja: オレのために稼ぐ金が 多すぎる

translation.en: Anyway, I'll get to the point. I need a favor.
translation.ja: ところで本題に入ろう 頼みがある

translation.en: I need someone who's a bit cute, a smooth operator.
translation.ja: 賢くて腕の立つ者が 必要だ

translation.en: Not a two-a-penny loudmouth. Too many grasses around.
translation.ja: 口の軽い奴はダメだ 密告者が多い

translation.en: -It would be a pleasure, Mr. Price. -Jimmy. You can call me Jimmy.
translation.ja: 光栄です ミスター･プライス ジミーと呼んでくれ

translation.en: Now, this favor. It's not for me, truth be told. It's for a good friend of mine.
translation.ja: オレの頼みじゃない オレの親友の頼みだ

translation.en: Like a blood brother. We were at school together.
translation.ja: 同じ学校を出た 兄弟同然の男で⸺

translation.en: Now he's a right wheeler-dealer.
translation.ja: 今は成功し ビルを何軒も所有

translation.en: Flinging up skyscrapers. His wife's a proper blue blood.
translation.ja: 今は成功し ビルを何軒も所有 奥さんは貴族の家柄だ

translation.en: I'll give you a clue. Eddie Temple.
translation.ja: 奥さんは貴族の家柄だ エディ･テンプル

translation.en: Does that name mean anything to you?
translation.ja: この名に聞き覚えは？

translation.en: -I know who you mean. -Now, Eddie's got a daughter.
translation.ja: 知ってます 彼の娘のチャーリーは⸺

translation.en: Charlie, bless her.
translation.ja: 彼の娘のチャーリーは⸺

translation.en: The light of his life. He worships the ground she walks on.
translation.ja: 彼にとって人生の光 崇拝しているほどだ

translation.en: She's a proper beauty, Charlie.
translation.ja: 本当に美しい娘で その名も⸺

translation.en: Or to give her her correct moniker, Charlie Spencer-Temple.
translation.ja: 本当に美しい娘で その名も⸺ チャーリー･スペンサー･ テンプル

translation.en: But she ain't behaving like a lady.
translation.ja: だが お嬢様なのに⸺

translation.en: She's hooked on the white powder and loves a wrong one.
translation.ja: 白い粉に溺(おぼ)れ 悪い仲間を愛した

translation.en: This is where you come in, right? You're gonna find her.
translation.ja: そこでお前の出番だ 彼女を捜してくれ

translation.en: -Find her? -She's gone missing.
translation.ja: 捜す？ 失踪したんだ

translation.en: Well, you should get a private detective.
translation.ja: 私立探偵を雇えば…

translation.en: Oh, right. Some nosy ex-policeman, still on the Scotland Yard payroll?
translation.ja: 何かと詮(せん)索(さく)好きな⸺ 元警官を雇えと言うのか？

translation.en: She's done a runner from a drug rehabilitation unit in the West Country.
translation.ja: イギリス西部地方の 麻薬療養所から逃げた

translation.en: Rehab.
translation.ja: 療養所？

translation.en: She got loved up in there with some lowlife crackhead called Kinky.
translation.ja: その療養所で⸺ キンキーという最低の 麻薬中毒者と恋仲になり⸺

translation.en: I reckon they've gone back to London.
translation.ja: ロンドンに戻った

translation.en: I wouldn't know where to begin.
translation.ja: でも どこから…

translation.en: Now and then we're asked to do something beyond the call of duty.
translation.ja: 義務を超えた頼みを⸺ 引き受けるのが “犠牲的精神”というものだ

translation.en: It's called sacrifice, son.
translation.ja: 引き受けるのが “犠牲的精神”というものだ

translation.en: Ask Gene. Ask Morty.
translation.ja: ジーンに聞け モーティにも

translation.en: -I'll do my best. -You do your best and find her.
translation.ja: 最善を 捜し出してくれ

translation.en: Keep Mr. McGuire posted.
translation.ja: 逐次 報告しろ

translation.en: I've also got a little business more in your usual line.
translation.ja: いつもの商売の依頼もある

translation.en: Gene will fill you in.
translation.ja: ジーンが話す

translation.en: Everything was to your satisfaction?
translation.ja: ご満足なさいましたか？

translation.en: -Fucking excellent, Angelo. -Thank you.
translation.ja: 文句なしだ

translation.en: Details, details. Things to do, things to get done.
translation.ja: “何をどうするべきかという 細かい話は多いが”

translation.en: Don't bother me with details. Just tell me when they're done.
translation.ja: “細かい話はよして 結果だけ報告しろ”

translation.en: -Who said that, son? -Winston Churchill?
translation.ja: 誰の言葉だ？ チャーチル？

translation.en: Close. No, I said it. James Lionel Price. Good boy.
translation.ja: 惜しい このオレだよ ジェームズ･Ｌ･プライス がんばれ

translation.en: I'll see you at the yard tomorrow. Say, 4:00.
translation.ja: 明日４時に会おう 商売の話をする

translation.en: Tell you about that bit of business. I've set up a meet for 5 with the Duke.
translation.ja: 明日４時に会おう 商売の話をする ５時にデュークと 打ち合わせだ

translation.en: -What's with him? -He's just had one of these.
translation.ja: どうした？ これをやった

translation.en: These are super Es. We'll make millions!
translation.ja: 上モノだ　金持ちになれる！

translation.en: I don't care. This is my boatyard.
translation.ja: 知るか オレの艇庫だぞ ヤクとそいつを外に出せ

translation.en: I want those pills and that fucking idiot out of here now.
translation.ja: オレの艇庫だぞ ヤクとそいつを外に出せ

translation.en: -I can't afford to get nicked. -Paul. Calm down, mate.
translation.ja: パクられる ポール 落ち着け

translation.en: I've got Gene coming down with a buyer. You'll be in your whack.
translation.ja: ジーンが客と来る 分け前はやる

translation.en: Here, chill. Have a pill.
translation.ja: 落ち着け　ヤクやれ

translation.en: Gene, why are we doing business with the Duke?
translation.ja: なぜデュークと仕事を？

translation.en: Yeah, why are we dealing with this joker?
translation.ja: あいつは信用ならないぞ

translation.en: He's a fucking maniac, a relic, a throwback, belongs to the Dark Ages.
translation.ja: 暗黒時代に生きてるような 時代遅れの男だ

translation.en: Will you just shut the fuck up?

...a nice...

translation.ja: 違う その銃は⸺ オレの銃だ こいつが盗んだんだ

translation.en: The one he stole from my flat.
translation.ja: オレの銃だ こいつが盗んだんだ

translation.en: -You killed Crazy Larry? -So?
translation.ja: お前がラリーを？ だから？

translation.en: -This fucker killed Jimmy. -Oh, Jesus Christ!
translation.ja: こいつがジミーを やめてくれ！

translation.en: -Why did you do it? -He was an informer.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ 奴は情報を売ってた

translation.en: He was a police informer!
translation.ja: 警察の情報屋だ

translation.en: Jimmy a grass? Are you fucking mad?
translation.ja: ジミーが？ お前 正気か？

translation.en: -You'll have to do better than that. -I've got a recording at home.
translation.ja: デタラメだ ＣＤ-Ｒがある

translation.en: Of Jimmy and a cozzer called Albie Carter.
translation.ja: ジミーとカーターの 会話の録音だ

translation.en: Gene, let's listen to this shit.
translation.ja: 聞いてみよう

translation.en: If he's lying, we'll both fucking kill him.

translation.en: Mr. Mortimer reckons...
translation.ja: モーティによれば⸺

translation.en: ...the Tylers are bringing in shooters from Jamaica via Manchester.
translation.ja: タイラーが殺し屋を雇った ジャマイカから来るらしい

translation.en: They got someone in Immigration straightened out.
translation.ja: 入国管理局の仲間が 手を回してる

translation.en: I don't think anybody gives a fuck about spades shooting spades.
translation.ja: 黒人同士の撃ち合いは 放っておく

translation.en: Don't you care about dead darkies, Albert?

translation.en: What about Gene? Does he suspect anything?

translation.en: What? About me working for the old firm?
translation.ja: 昔の仲間との仕事をか？

translation.en: Convinced?
translation.ja: 納得か？

translation.en: You don't fuck about, do you?
translation.ja: よく分かったよ

translation.en: Jimmy was skint, huh?
translation.ja: ジミーは文無しだったか

translation.en: That's why he set up the whole Amsterdam business with Duke.
translation.ja: だから今回の件を企んだ

translation.en: I really think we should keep all of this to ourselves, right?
translation.ja: これは秘密にしたほうが いいと思う

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: そうか？

translation.en: Why did you kill Larry?
translation.ja: なぜラリーを？

translation.en: Funny enough, it was Jimmy who persuaded me.
translation.ja: 実はジミーに説得されてね

translation.en: Jimmy never liked Larry.
translation.ja: 彼はラリーを嫌ってた

translation.en: Look at that wrong one waving his money around. It ain't right.
translation.ja: 腐った奴だ 金を見せびらかして

translation.en: Hey, I love you, man.
translation.ja: 愛してるぜ

translation.en: He saw the future was drugs and it needed to be run like a business.
translation.ja: ジミーは麻薬に将来を見て⸺ 商売にしようと

translation.en: Crazy Larry was no fucking businessman.
translation.ja: ラリーは商売下手で⸺

translation.en: After that business with Kilburn Jerry...
translation.ja: ジェリーの事件の後…

translation.en: That's it, son. You do him. Bollocks!
translation.ja: そうだ　やっちまえ バカ野郎！

translation.en: ...he wanted him gone.
translation.ja: 奴を消すのを⸺

translation.en: I didn't have any problem doing him.
translation.ja: オレは引き受けた

translation.en: That's why I did it.
translation.ja: そういう訳だ

translation.en: But why did you keep the gun?
translation.ja: 銃は捨てずに？

translation.en: Sounds silly now, but it was me favorite.
translation.ja: バカな話だが⸺ お気に入りでね

translation.en: I hope you don't tell the other guns you've got favorites.
translation.ja: 他の銃が嫉妬するぞ

translation.en: So, what's the next move, boss?
translation.ja: 次はどうする ボス？

translation.en: Well, I'm going to bed.
translation.ja: オレは寝るよ

translation.en: I don't know what you two are doing. We can talk about it tomorrow.
translation.ja: 好きにしてくれ 明日 話そう

translation.en: Sorry?
translation.ja: 何？ “マダムズ　ムッシューズ メ･アンファン”

translation.en: Sorry, mate, what was that?
translation.ja: あの… 何だって？

translation.en: Would you pack that in? I've got a fucking test next week.
translation.ja: 邪魔するな 来週テストなんだ

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I'm sorry. I was just saying....

translation.en: So when does the target get here, then?
translation.ja: ターゲットは いつ来る？

translation.en: The target? The target's gonna be here at exactly midday.
translation.ja: ターゲットは 正午きっかりに来るよ

translation.en: -Where? -Here, right fucking here.
translation.ja: 場所は？ ここだよ

translation.en: Got a photo?
translation.ja: 写真は？

translation.en: -Don't worry about it. -Who's worried?
translation.ja: ないが分かる 分かる？

translation.en: I'll have some binoculars. I'll give you a little signal.
translation.ja: 双眼鏡でのぞき 合図する

translation.en: I could get the 10 past 1 home from here.
translation.ja: １時10分の列車に乗れるな

translation.en: Let's have a little recce.
translation.ja: 下調べだ

translation.en: After we do the business, walk slowly back.
translation.ja: 仕事がすんだら歩いて戻る

translation.en: Remember, it's a stroll in the park.
translation.ja: 公園を散歩するように

translation.en: Don't run, whatever you do.
translation.ja: 何があっても走るな

translation.en: The first five minutes, nobody'll have a clue what's going on. Hopefully, it'll be mayhem.
translation.ja: 初めの５分は みんな驚き その後 騒ぎになる

translation.en: So try to stay relaxed.
translation.ja: 落ち着くんだぞ

translation.en: Don't do anything to draw attention to yourself.
translation.ja: 人の目をひく行動をとるな

translation.en: Or me.
translation.ja: いいか

translation.en: Afterwards, take me to the Underground station.
translation.ja: 仕事の後⸺ 地下鉄の駅に案内しろ

translation.en: I'll look after myself.
translation.ja: そこで別れる

translation.en: There.
translation.ja: あそこだ

translation.en: Time?
translation.ja: 時間は？

translation.en: Six minutes to 12.
translation.ja: 12時６分前

translation.en: I hope he's not gonna be late.
translation.ja: 遅れないといいが

translation.en: -Maybe he'll be early. -That'd be nice.
translation.ja: 早く来るかな 好都合だ

translation.en: Can you see that guy on the left?
translation.ja: あの左の男は？

translation.en: -Big fella, marching up the hill. -That's our man.
translation.ja: あの長身の男か？ そう ドラガンだ

translation.en: -Are you sure? -For fuck's sake. I'm gonna call him.
translation.ja: 確かか？ じゃ電話してみよう

translation.en: It's up to you. You're the client.
translation.ja: 好きにしろ　君がボスだ

translation.en: As soon as he answers, he's gone, okay?
translation.ja: 電話に出たら やれ

translation.en: Okey-dokey.
translation.ja: オーケー

translation.en: Stand by.
translation.ja: 狙え

translation.en: Now.
translation.ja: 今だ

translation.en: Hello, may I help you?
translation.ja: やあ ご用かな？

translation.en: Don't move a muscle.
translation.ja: ピクリとも動くな

translation.en: -Do I have your attention? -Yes.
translation.ja: 聞いてるか？ ああ

translation.en: You English, you have no idea of honor and respect.
translation.ja: 英国人てのは⸺ 名誉も尊敬も知らない

translation.en: I usually kill for less. I want my cargo and the Duke.
translation.ja: 普通なら殺してる ブツとデュークを渡せ

translation.en: I haven't got your pills. Just give me a day.
translation.ja: ヤクは持ってない １日くれ

translation.en: Don't piss in my pocket and tell me it's raining.
translation.ja: 小便かけて雨だと言う気か

translation.en: Now listen for the last time. -You'll bring me what is mine. -Look, I don't-- Jesus!
translation.ja: 最後によく聞け オレのブツを渡すんだ

translation.en: You have one more day.
translation.ja: あと１日だけやる

translation.en: See you tomorrow at dusk by the statue.
translation.ja: 明朝 銅像の脇で会おう

translation.en: Remember, I will be watching you.
translation.ja: 明朝 銅像の脇で会おう ずっと見てるぞ

translation.en: What the fuck were you thinking?
translation.ja: お前 何を考えてたんだ？

translation.en: Getting Trevor's man down here to shoot this Serb in a park!
translation.ja: セルビア人を公園で 殺そうとするとは

translation.en: Trevor's gonna go ballistic. Now, what the fuck do I tell him?
translation.ja: トレバーが怒るぞ どう言えばいい？

translation.en: -What a fucking mess. -You've gone mad.
translation.ja: 何て事を！ 正気か？

translation.en: -Think you're a gangster? -Fuck off!
translation.ja: ギャングの真似か？

translation.en: You wanna play? You do it somewhere else.
translation.ja: そうなのか？ 遊びは よそでやれ 脚を叩き折る

translation.en: If you do it near me, I'll put you in a fucking wheelchair.
translation.ja: 遊びは よそでやれ 脚を叩き折る

translation.en: Stick to your fucking sums.
translation.ja: 商売だけしてろ

translation.en: Listen. Listen to me.
translation.ja: オレの話を聞いてくれ

translation.en: Dragan's killed Paul. He's done the Duke.
translation.ja: ドラガンは ポールを殺したよ

translation.en: He's just put a bullet between Lucky's eyes. I was there!
translation.ja: ラッキーの頭も 撃ち抜いた

translation.en: He's watching our every move. Who's next, me?

translation.en: -I wish. -Fuck off! Could be you or Morty.
translation.ja: そう願う お前か モーティかも

translation.en: Dragan said he wanted the pills and the Duke. Where's the Duke?
translation.ja: だがドラガンは デュークを渡せと…

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: I should've told you this earlier.
translation.ja: 話すべきだった

translation.en: Duke and Slasher came by the office the other day.
translation.ja: 先日 デュークたちが 来たんだ

translation.en: Paul the boatman was topped last night.
translation.ja: ポールが昨夜 殺された

translation.en: I've gotta get on my toes sharpish.
translation.ja: グズグズしてられねえ

translation.en: I want Jimmy brought here right now, yeah?
translation.ja: ジミーを連れてきな

translation.en: Getting that smug yuppie bastard to tell Duke those pills were useless...
translation.ja: あのスカした若造 “ブツは価値がない”とさ

translation.en: ...after sending us over in the first place.
translation.ja: そっちが依頼したのに

translation.en: Hang on, you've lost me now.
translation.ja: どういう事だ？ あたしらをだます気なら 警察に話してやる

translation.en: If you have us over, I swear by fucking almighty God, I'll call the fucking law.
translation.ja: あたしらをだます気なら 警察に話してやる 何言ってるんだ サシャ 黙ってろ

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I'll call the law.
translation.ja: 何言ってるんだ サシャ 黙ってろ

translation.en: She didn't mean that. She's upset.
translation.ja: 本気じゃない

translation.en: Shut the fuck up!
translation.ja: 黙れ 警察に話して…

translation.en: That's where playing at being a gangster gets you.
translation.ja: ギャングの真似すると こうなる

translation.en: You're not in there because I like you.
translation.ja: 友達だから助ける

translation.en: I'm beginning to feel left out.
translation.ja: オレは仲間外れか？

translation.en: Why?

translation.en: Freddie Hurst is still in intensive care... ...after your jolly little reunion the other day.
translation.ja: お前と再会したフレディは 今も集中治療室だぞ

translation.en: Fucking hell, Duke.

translation.en: For once, you might be of some use.

translation.en: That was Gazza on the phone. It's on.
translation.ja: ガザから電話だ 交渉成立だ

translation.en: He'll pick you up at 9 in the morning. Gallows Corner. Know it?
translation.ja: 朝の９時に 迎えに来るとさ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ なあ

translation.en: With Jimmy gone, these pills will make a nice contribution...
translation.ja: ジミーが死に⸺ この仕事が オレの引退資金になる

translation.en: ...to my retirement fund, so don't fuck things up again, okay?

translation.en: If you do...
translation.ja: もし何かあったら 後悔させてやるぞ

translation.en: ...you'll wish this Dragan had shot you between the eyes, understand?
translation.ja: もし何かあったら 後悔させてやるぞ 分かったな

translation.en: Best of luck.
translation.ja: がんばれ

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ああ 分かったよ

translation.en: Fuck off!
translation.ja: ふざけんな

translation.en: Sidney, I've told you, stop answering my phone, okay?
translation.ja: シドニー 私の電話に出ないでってば

translation.en: -Who was it? -Wrong number.
translation.ja: 誰？ 間違い電話だ

translation.en: -What's up, mate? -Hello, Sidney.
translation.ja: やあ シドニー

translation.en: -How you doing, then? -I'm all right. How are you?
translation.ja: 元気か？ ああ　お前はどうだ？

translation.en: I'm all right, mate, yeah.
translation.ja: いい調子だよ

translation.en: Gazza, this place stinks. We want to get you out of here. Fifty pence a pill.
translation.ja: ここはひどい場所だな １錠50ペンス

translation.en: That way, we all come out with something.
translation.ja: それなら皆が儲かる

translation.en: -I think they're worth more than that. -This is a reality check.
translation.ja: 安すぎるな ガザ 頼むから 現実的に考えろよ

translation.en: Paul's dead, Jimmy's dead. Duke and Slasher, fuck knows where they are.
translation.ja: ポールもジミーも⸺ デュークも消え ブツは盗品

translation.en: This gear is knock-off, and the Serbs you nicked it from...
translation.ja: デュークも消え ブツは盗品 セルビア人はお前を 簡単に殺すぞ

translation.en: ...they'd kill you like you'd take a piss.
translation.ja: セルビア人はお前を 簡単に殺すぞ

translation.en: Gazza, the old bill are outside!
translation.ja: やばい 警察が来たぞ！

translation.en: -Gazza, no! -Go, go, go!
translation.ja: ガザ よせ！

translation.en: -Let's have it! -Don't point that gun at me.
translation.ja: やってやる！ オレに向けるな！

translation.en: -Put it down! -We're going in!
translation.ja: 中に入る！

translation.en: Gazza, look at me. Put it down. You're gonna get us all shot.

translation.en: Fuck it! Boat!
translation.ja: くそっ！

translation.en: Stay there!
translation.ja: 動くな！

translation.en: -Gazza, wait! -Fucking hurry up, then!
translation.ja: ガザ 待て！ 急ぐんだ！

translation.en: Get in.
translation.ja: 乗れ！

translation.en: Is this for me?
translation.ja: オレにか？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Your cargo's gone, I'm afraid.
translation.ja: 残念だがブツはない

translation.en: -It was seized by-- -I know already.
translation.ja: 警察に… 知ってる

translation.en: -How do you know? -I watched.
translation.ja: なぜだ 見ていた

translation.en: I don't believe this. Cox's gonna go fucking spare!
translation.ja: 何やってる！ 警部が怒るぞ！

translation.en: We are in shit. You lot have fucked up again.
translation.ja: 大失態だ またヘマやりやがって！

translation.en: Oh, fucking hell.
translation.ja: あきれたよ

translation.en: Leave it to me, lads. I'll explain to Inspector Cox...

translation.en: ...that his suspect has scarpered because of your blundering.
translation.ja: お前らが容疑者を逃がしたと 警部に言う

translation.en: Knobheads. Helmets off.
translation.ja: メットを脱げ

translation.en: Does this settle things, then?
translation.ja: これで納得か？

translation.en: How did that other errand go?
translation.ja: 結局どうなった？

translation.en: Success, as far as I could make out.
translation.ja: 成功だ オレはそう思う

translation.en: Where is my fucking prisoner?
translation.ja: オレのホシは一体どこだ？

translation.en: -You old ladies couldn't catch a cold. -Sir, I just--

translation.en: Shut up, you soppy wanker.
translation.ja: 黙れ ボケチンども！

translation.en: -Go. -Dingo Bongo.
translation.ja: ビンゴ　ボンゴ

translation.en: -Is this area now secure? -Yes, sir.
translation.ja: 周囲は安全か？ はい

translation.en: You can fuck off, then.
translation.ja: じゃもう消えろ

translation.en: So where are the pills, genius?
translation.ja: ヤクはどこだ？

translation.en: I think this is them now.
translation.ja: 今 来たよ

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.ja: 何だ あれは？

translation.en: -Couldn't leave this behind. -Greenies.
translation.ja: 車が惜しくて 金だ

translation.en: You are in the wrong game. You should work with us.
translation.ja: 商売を間違ってる オレたちと組め

translation.en: -Are we square? -Yeah, we're sweet.
translation.ja: 満足か？ いいだろう

translation.en: It seems so. Your pills are in the back. Help yourself.
translation.ja: いいとさ ブツはトランクだ

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Okay. Yes, it will do. Bye-bye.
translation.ja: そうか　分かった じゃあな

translation.en: You're off the hook, Morty. Freddie Hurst is out of his coma.
translation.ja: 安心しろ モーティ フレディは助かった

translation.en: Good news.
translation.ja: よかったな

translation.en: -Yeah. -Good news, mate.
translation.ja: 違うか？ いい知らせだ

translation.en: Listen, I've got one for you.
translation.ja: 面白い話がある

translation.en: Irishman caught his son snorting charlie.
translation.ja: コカインを吸う息子に⸺

translation.en: He said, "If I catch you doing that again, I'll rub your fucking nose in it."
translation.ja: 父が “鼻を粉にすり込むぞ”

translation.en: -Do you have the pills? -In the cars.
translation.ja: ブツはあるか？ 車の中だ

translation.en: Boss wants to see you in his office.
translation.ja: ボスがお前を待ってる

translation.en: Come in. Sit down.
translation.ja: 入れ 座れ

translation.en: Here you are. Payment.
translation.ja: これが支払いだ

translation.en: -You look shocked, son. -Are you taking the fucking piss?
translation.ja: 驚いた顔だな これは冗談か？

translation.en: You and Jimmy have caused my little angel Charlotte considerable anxiety.
translation.ja: お前とジミーは⸺ 私の大事な娘に 大きな精神的苦痛を与えた

translation.en: She's off to Arizona for a course of intense treatment.
translation.ja: 娘はアリゾナで 治療を受けることに…

translation.en: I'm keeping those pills for myself, by way of compensation.
translation.ja: その代償として 今回のブツはもらう

translation.en: I think I'm entitled. Simple. End of.
translation.ja: 正当な取り分だ 文句は ないな

translation.en: The amount of trouble you've caused the last few days.
translation.ja: この数日のトラブルの 代償だよ

translation.en: Jimmy.
translation.ja: ジミーは⸺

translation.en: Poor little Jimmy.
translation.ja: 哀れな奴だった

translation.en: It would be in your interests...
translation.ja: お前のためにも⸺

translation.en: ...if this thing finishes here, now, today. Understand?
translation.ja: 今 ここで 全て終えるべきだ

translation.en: It doesn't matter what I do. This lot are gonna come after you.
translation.ja: オレが納得しても 仲間があんたを狙う

translation.en: They're too long in the tooth to rampage round the country...

translation.en: ...looking for revenge. Look at them.
translation.ja: 無理に復讐したりしないさ どいつも年を取った タマの小さい⸺

translation.en: Bunch of underendowed, aging fuck-pigs.
translation.ja: どいつも年を取った タマの小さい⸺ ブタどもだ

translation.en: Are you enjoying this?
translation.ja: 楽しいか？

translation.en: No. On the contrary. Take it as a compliment.
translation.ja: いや　ほめ言葉だよ

translation.en: You're a bright young man.
translation.ja: お前は若く賢い

translation.en: This monkey business is in your blood, under your skin.
translation.ja: 商売の才能もある まだこの世界に 入ったばかりだ

translation.en: You're not getting out, you're just getting in. I've every faith in you.
translation.ja: まだこの世界に 入ったばかりだ 私は見込んでる

translation.en: One day, it will be you sitting here...
translation.ja: いつかお前は 私にとって代わり⸺

translation.en: ...telling some Young Turk the facts of life.
translation.ja: 若者に人生を 説くことだろう

translation.en: And they are, Mr. Temple?
translation.ja: 人生だって？

translation.en: You're born, you take shit.
translation.ja: 生まれるのは辛い

translation.en: Get out in the world, you take more shit.
translation.ja: 世界に出るのは もっと辛い

translation.en: Climb a little higher, you take less shit.
translation.ja: 成功すれば⸺ 辛くなくなる

translation.en: Until one day, you're up in the rarefied atmosphere...
translation.ja: 高みに登りつめた日には⸺

translation.en: ...and you've forgotten what shit even looks like.
translation.ja: 過去の辛さは忘れている

translation.en: Welcome to the layer cake, son.
translation.ja: それが“断層世界(レイヤー･ケーキ)”だ

translation.en: This thing ends here, tonight. You understand?
translation.ja: 今回の件はここで終わりだ

translation.en: Drug money's easy money, not grief.
translation.ja: 麻薬の稼ぎはあぶく銭だ

translation.en: The odds, as you can see, are against you.
translation.ja: 割りの悪い仕事だよ

translation.en: Good night.

translation.en: If you're gonna hang around in this game... ...that's where you've got to aim to be.

translation.en: In your bonded warehouse with the ex-soldiers doing the dirty work...

translation.en: ...while you deliver the suspect lecture... ...to baffle your opponents and cover your tracks.

translation.en: I'll let you know as soon as I do. Again, I am sorry about Lucky.

translation.en: Did I, fuck.

translation.en: But suddenly there was a void where once there was Jimmy Price.

translation.en: After a couple days, Eddie's little "getting in and getting out" speech...

translation.en: ...started to make sense.

translation.en: The king is dead.

translation.en: What was true then is true now.
